caption.p: Reasons of increased severity of COVID-19 in diabetes based on various studies (mostly unadjusted analyses).

tr.td: (1) Glycaemic instability: hyperglycaemia and possibly hypoglycaemia
(2) Immune defects especially impaired T-cell response
(3) Associated comorbidities like obesity, heart and kidney diseases
(4) Increased furin (involved in entry of virus into cell)
